name: Desert Palms Alice Springs
description:
An oasis in the outback, the Desert Palms is a 3.5 star outback property offering individual studio villa accommodation, set around a crystal clear free-form pool with island and waterfall surrounded by tropical gardens.
All villas are air-conditioned and include bougainvillea-covered verandahs, private en-suites and kitchenette facilities. The hotel offers outstanding value for the visitor wanting comfort at an affordable price.

We're located in the main accommodation centre of Alice Springs on the banks of the Todd River, close to town, Lasseters Casino - Alice Springs entertainment hot spot, the Convention Centre, and the Alice Springs Golf Club is our backyard.

Some of the best restaurants in Alice Springs are within meters of the Desert Palms. These include the Golf Course Club House, Hanumans (Indian/Thai) and Balloons Bistro at the Double Tree by Hilton and the four restaurants at Lasseter's Casino, including the Juicy Rump.

We offer a small kiosk/shop on-site where food items and liquor can be purchased, a guest laundry, BBQ area, secure gated off street parking directly outside each villa, and free Wifi in villa and throughout the property.  We also have an Espresso Coffee Machine available during reception hours.  

Desert Palms offers a calm, peaceful environment, which creates a sense of relief for the weary traveller. After a hectic day of travelling by road or air take pleasure in watching the world go by on the privacy of your own private balcony surrounded by palms trees while watching the spectacular sunsets over the MacDonald Ranges. 
All villas are air-conditioned and include bougainvillea-covered verandahs, private en-suites and kitchenette facilities. The hotel offers outstanding value for the visitor wanting comfort at an affordable price.

We're located in the main accommodation centre of Alice Springs on the banks of the Todd River, close to town, Lasseters Casino - Alice Springs

houseRules.notes:
Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated below (see 'Things to Note' information)

The Desert Palms Alice Springs will accept your cancellation without penalty up to 48 hours before your arrival. This is defined as being before 2pm (the hotel check-in time) two days before you are due to stay. Failure to arrive will result in a no show charge. Cancellation / no show fee equals the first night of your stay. A 10% fee will apply to all prepaid deposits if the booking is cancelled.

All major Credit Cards accepted, Cash and Eftpos . There is a 1.8% surcharge on credit card payments.

During peak periods the Desert Palms will ask for a first night non-refundable deposit to secure reservations.

A mid-week housekeeping service is provided for bookings of 7 nights or more. During reception hours tea/coffee/sugar/milk and fresh towels are available from the front desk.   

Guest arriving after 8.00pm please contact reception before this time so arrangements can be made for gate and room access.

Please note that a credit card pre-authorisation of AUD $100 is required on check in and a photocopy of a driver's license or other photo ID is required in the same name as on the booking confirmation. This pre-authorisation is fully refundable upon check-out and subject to a damage inspection of the accommodation, no smoking in the room and return of room key. If the guests do not own a credit card, a cash bond of $100 will be required. The cash bond would be refunded after the room inspection on check out .
